dct_title_s: Burgundiae inferioris quae ducatus nomine censetur, des. 1584
dct_alternative_sm: Bvrgvndiae inferioris qvae dvcatvs nomine censetvr, des. 1584
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Scala milliarium Burgundicorum."
Appears in Ortelius' Theatrum Orbis Terrarum, Latin edition, 1584.
